messages.message: How’s everything going, I feel like we haven’t talked in a really long time.
It’s going well, Jack and I started dating actually.
What, why didn’t you tell me??
I mean, you don’t really like him that much.
Well I don’t love him, but he’s my bff’s bf, so I’ll still be nice to him.
I mean yeah he’s a little weird.
Well it’s just that he felt you might get a little upset about us dating so he didn’t want me to tell you.
Well I’m not upset, I just want to be there for you, I don’t want this to ruin our friendship.
Don’t you think his not wanting me to know proves my point about him being weird…
He said to keep it our little secret, I don’t see anything wrong with that. It’s kind of cute actually.
It seems like he's trying to manipulate you
That sounds a little concerning, what if he's trying to get you to hide something bad
See, we knew you’d say this, let’s just stop talking about this.
No he isn't, why would he do that? He's a good person and I trust him.
I would be wary of him
See we knew you'd say this, let's just stop talking about this.
Well has he asked you to do things you know would get you in trouble or things that make you a little uncomfortable?
Maybe a little, I don't really want to talk about it.
Alright I won't force you
Alright, but I'm always here for you if you decide you want to talk
